c74object.name: abc.hoa.ringmod~
c74object.digest: Abclib's High Order Ambisonics (HOA) Ring Modulation
c74object.description:
abc.hoa.ringmod~ is a ambisonic ring modulation process. This object have two modes : syn and fx. The fx mode applies ring modulation to the ambisonics channels and the syn mode generates spatial modulated components from one mono signal at a given ambisonic order N.
The ring modulation is defined for each i spatial component among P=2*N+1 at the ambisonic order N in 2D and P=(N+1)^2 in 3D as a frequency of 0 if factor is under 1-(i+1)/P and freq*functiontype((i+1)/P) in the contrary case, where delay is the maximum delay applied (in samples) and functiontype is a distribution function for frequencies. The user can choose this frequency of modulation distribution among 22 different ones. The frequency increases according to the index of ambisonic components. But it increases at each step and it is modulated by a threshold. For the 2D ring modulation, the increment order follows the Ambisonics Channel Number. For the 3D ring modulation, the user can choose the increment order among 3 different ones. Therefore, delays are progressively revealed when the factor increases:
- when the factor is close to 0, only upper components are modulated;
- when the factor increases, more and more components are modulated.

objarg.name: ambisonic-order
objarg.digest: The ambisonic order of the decorrelation process
objarg.description: First argument is the ambisonic order [init=1, min=1, max=7, step=1].

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description: set the mode of ring modulation. Possible values: 'fx', 'syn'.

method.name: frequency-modulation
method.description: set the frequency modulation window size in Hz, also set maximum frequency value [init=48000, min=10, max=262144, step=1].
method.digest: set the delay window size in samples

method.name: factor
method.description: set the decorralation factor value between 0 and 1, 0 means no fx, 1 is full decorrelation [init=0, min=0, max=1, step=0.001].
method.digest: set the decorralation factor value between 0 and 1

method.name: fdbk
method.description: set the feedback amont value between 0 and 0.99, 0 means no feedback [init=0, min=0, max=0.99, step=0.001].
method.digest: set the feedback factor value between 0 and 0.99

method.name: functiontype
method.description:
set the function decorralation type [init=0, min=0, max=21, step=1]
Possible functions from 0 to 21 correspond to :
x, x^2, sin, log(1+x), sqrt(x), 1-cos(Pi/2*x), (1-cos(Pi*x))/2, 1-(1-x)^2, composite1, x^3, 1-(1-x)^3, composite2, x^4, 1-(1-x)^4, composite3, x^5, 1-(1-x)^5, composite4, 2^(10(x-1)), composite5, 1-sqrt(1-x^2), sqrt(1-(x-1)^2).
